DamageResistances: Bludgeoning, Slashing, and Piercing from non-magical weapons, Fire, Lightning, Thunder, Acid

Traits.Name: Camouflage
Traits.Content: The Concrete Pigeon has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in urban environments.

Traits.Name: Rubble Wing
Traits.Content: When the Concrete Pigeon flies, it leaves a trail of debris in its wake, causing difficult terrain in a 10-foot radius around its flight path until the end of its next turn.

Traits.Name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
Traits.Content: If the creature fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Concrete Pigeon makes two attacks with Wing Strike and one attack with Shattering Peck.

Actions.Name: Wing Strike
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +11 to hit, dealing 12 (2d10 + 1) bludgeoning damage. The attack sends a shockwave of debris around the target, causing them to make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone.

Actions.Name: Shattering Peck
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +11 to hit, dealing 15 (2d10 + 3) piercing damage. The target must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw or suffer the 'Stunned' condition until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Rubble Cascade
Actions.Content: Area of effect action: The Concrete Pigeon flaps its wings, creating a 30-foot cone of debris. Each creature within range must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw or take 33 (6d10) bludgeoning damage or half as much on a successful save. The area becomes difficult terrain as rubble falls and settles.

LegendaryActions.Name: Urban Camouflage (Costs 1 Action)
LegendaryActions.Content: The Concrete Pigeon momentarily melds into its surroundings, gaining advantage on its next Stealth check and becoming invisible until it attacks.

LegendaryActions.Name: Rubble Cascade (Costs 2 Actions)
LegendaryActions.Content: The creature can choose to use the Rubble Cascade action.

LegendaryActions.Name: Terrifying Call (Costs 3 Actions)
LegendaryActions.Content: The Concrete Pigeon emits a chilling call that reverberates like shattering glass. Each creature within 30 feet must make a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened until the end of their next turn.
